biotools.summary:
RNA-Ribo Explorer (RRE) is an interactive, stand-alone, and graphical software for analysing, viewing and mining both transcriptome (typically RNA-seq) and translatome (typically Ribosome profiling or Ribo-seq) datasets.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'RNA-Ribo Explorer'
